s0201: Therefore the Chu army night attacked and buried alive over 200,000 Qin soldiers south of Xin'an city.
s0202: Then proceeded to pacify Qin territory.
s0203: Hangu Pass had troops guarding the pass, could not enter.
s0204: He also heard Liu Bang had already taken Xianyang, Xiang Yu greatly angered, sent Dangyang Jun and others to attack the pass.
s0205: Xiang Yu then entered, reached Xi west.
s0206: Liu Bang's army was at Bashang, could not meet with Xiang Yu.
s0207: Liu Bang's Left Marshal Cao Wushang sent someone to speak to Xiang Yu saying: 'Liu Bang wishes to be king of Guanzhong, make Ziying prime minister, all precious treasures will belong to you.'
s0208: Xiang Yu greatly angered, said: 'Tomorrow feast the soldiers, to attack and defeat Liu Bang's army!'
s0209: At this time, Xiang Yu had 400,000 troops, at Xinfeng Hongmen, Liu Bang had 100,000 troops, at Bashang.
s0210: Fan Zeng advised Xiang Yu saying: 'When Liu Bang was in Shandong, greedy for wealth and goods, fond of beautiful women.
s0211: Now entered the pass, wealth and goods he takes nothing, women he does not favor, this shows his ambitions are not small.
s0212: Please kill him quickly, do not delay.'
s0215: Fan Zeng sent Xiang Zhuang to banquet in the army tent, to make Xiang Zhuang dance with sword, take opportunity to strike Liu Bang.
s0216: Xiang Zhuang danced with sword, Xiang Yu rose and toasted, saying: 'The prince cannot dance.'
s0218: Fan Zeng beckoned the waiter to come, wished to strike the jade ring as signal to attack.
s0219: The waiter understood, struck the jade ring.
s0220: Xiang Bo saw this, went out and told Zhang Liang.
s0221: Zhang Liang went in and told Liu Bang.
s0223: Zhang Liang said: 'Let me go out first.'
s0224: Zhang Liang went out, Fan Zeng entered, saw Liu Bang still sitting calmly drinking.
s0225: Fan Zeng said: 'The prince is brave!'
s0226: Then went out, called Xiang Zhuang to enter.
s0227: Xiang Zhuang entered, Fan Zeng blocked the door and said: 'The prince wishes to give you a sword dance.'
s0228: Xiang Zhuang danced with sword, Fan Zeng wished to strike Liu Bang.
s0230: Liu Bang rose to relieve himself, wished to leave.
s0231: Fan Kuai said: 'Now the matter is urgent, let me go in and protect.'
s0232: Fan Kuai carried a sword and shield, entered the tent, sat with back to the wall, glared at Xiang Zhuang.
s0234: Fan Kuai scolded Xiang Yu saying: 'My lord established you as king, you received the Chu king's order to attack Qin, now Qin is destroyed, you should divide the land to enfeoff the princes.
s0235: Now you wish to kill the meritorious, this is the way to destroy Chu.'
s0236: Xiang Yu could not reply, said: 'Sit and drink.'
s0237: Fan Kuai sat and drank with Liu Bang.
s0238: Liu Bang left to relieve himself, Fan Kuai followed out.
s0239: Liu Bang said: 'The matter is urgent, I cannot return.'
s0240: He called Zhang Liang to stay, gave him white jade ring as thanks to Xiang Yu.
s0241: Liu Bang rode alone, fled through Xiaopi.
s0242: Zhang Liang entered, Xiang Yu asked where Liu Bang was.
s0243: Zhang Liang said: 'He left suddenly, saying he had urgent business.'
s0244: Xiang Yu said: 'The prince is polite.'
s0245: Then gave the white jade ring to Zhang Liang.
s0246: Xiang Yu camped at Hongmen, Liu Bang camped at Bashang.
s0247: Xiang Yu made Liu Bang king of Han, with Bashang as capital.
s0249: King Huai of Chu heard Xiang Yu had made kings in the west, was angry, wished to attack Xiang Yu.
s0250: Xiang Yu heard this, sent Ying Bu to kill King Huai at Chen, buried him at Yinling.
s0251: Xiang Yu then summoned the princes to Jibei to swear alliance.
s0252: He made Tian Rong king of Qi, with Linzi as capital.
s0253: Made Peng Yue king of Liang, with Xiapei as capital.
s0254: Made Han Xin king of Chu, with Chu as capital.
s0255: Made Ying Bu king of Jiujiang, with Jiujiang as capital.
s0256: Made Wu Rui king of Hengshan, with Hengshan as capital.
s0257: Made Gong Ao king of Linhuai, with Linhuai as capital.
s0258: Made Zang Tu king of Yan, with Yan as capital.
s0259: Made Zhang Er king of Changshan, with Changshan as capital.
s0260: Made Wei Bao king of Wei, with Pingyang as capital.
s0261: Made Sima Ang king of Dai, with Dai as capital.
